<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Envenom Fangs](/Feats.aspx?ID=5638) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=760" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 26 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Iruxi Armaments](/Feats.aspx?ID=5633)

</column>

---

You envenom your fangs. If the next fangs Strike you make before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, the Strike deals an additional 1d6 [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). The poison becomes inert after you hit, or at the end of your next turn, whichever comes first.
name: Envenom Fangs
